main_definition: To persist in an activity or process without interruption.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To keep going after a pause or break.
meanings_and_examples.example: After taking a short rest, she decided to continue watching the movie.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To maintain an ongoing action or process indefinitely.
meanings_and_examples.example: The team continued practicing every day until they won the championship.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To not stop doing something due to difficulties or challenges.
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite facing many obstacles, he decided to continue pursuing his dreams.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In mathematics and logic, it refers to the continuation of a sequence, series, or argument without interruption.
meanings_and_examples.example: The pattern continues with odd numbers in increasing order.
